Uses of Interface
ca.eandb.jmist.framework.Scalable

  • Packages that use Scalable 
    Package Description
    ca.eandb.jmist.framework  
    ca.eandb.jmist.framework.geometry  
    ca.eandb.jmist.framework.lens  
    ca.eandb.jmist.framework.scene

    • Uses of Scalable in ca.eandb.jmist.framework

      Subinterfaces of Scalable in ca.eandb.jmist.framework 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  AffineTransformable2
      A two dimensional object that can be transformed according to an affine transformation (linear transformations plus translations).
      interface  AffineTransformable3
      A three dimensional object that can be transformed according to an affine transformation (linear transformations plus translations).
      interface  AxisStretchable2
      A two dimensional object that can be stretched along the coordinate axes.
      interface  AxisStretchable3
      A three dimensional object that can be stretched along the coordinate axes.
      interface  ShapePreservingTransformable2
      A two dimensional object to which shape preserving transformations (translation, rotations, uniform scaling) may be applied.
      interface  ShapePreservingTransformable3
      A three dimensional object to which shape preserving transformations (translation, rotations, uniform scaling) may be applied.
      interface  Stretchable2
      A two dimensional object that can be stretched along an arbitrary axis.
      interface  Stretchable3
      A three dimensional object that can be stretched along an arbitrary axis.
      Classes in ca.eandb.jmist.framework that implement Scalable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AffineTransformation2
      An abstract base class for classes implementing AffineTransformable2.
      class  AffineTransformation3
      An abstract base class for classes implementing AffineTransformable3.
      class  InvertibleAffineTransformation2
      A class for classes implementing AffineTransformable2 that require the inverse of the transformation matrix.
      class  InvertibleAffineTransformation3
      A class for classes implementing AffineTransformable3 that require the inverse of the transformation matrix.

    • Uses of Scalable in ca.eandb.jmist.framework.geometry

      Classes in ca.eandb.jmist.framework.geometry that implement Scalable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MeshBuilder
      A builder for creating polygonal meshes.
      class  TransformableGeometry
      A CompositeGeometry that may be transformed.

    • Uses of Scalable in ca.eandb.jmist.framework.lens

      Classes in ca.eandb.jmist.framework.lens that implement Scalable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TransformableLens
      A Lens to which affine transformations may be applied.

    • Uses of Scalable in ca.eandb.jmist.framework.scene

      Classes in ca.eandb.jmist.framework.scene that implement Scalable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TransformableSceneElement
      A decorator SceneElement that transforms the underlying SceneElement.

    • Uses of Scalable in ca.eandb.jmist.framework.texture

      Classes in ca.eandb.jmist.framework.texture that implement Scalable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TransformableTexture2
      A decorator Texture2 that applies an affine transformation to the decorated Texture2.
